Text:
I usually use TvTeam, but their torrent isn't working for me (can't connect to a seeder).

I've never downloaded a TV episode in rar format before. How exactly does this work? Can you get a single .avi file out of these files?

You need to extract it with something like Winrar. The r01, etc., files aren't actual video files. I believe it is just a "zipped" archive of a video file.

I find them useless, most people do, the uploader may have alternate reasons for doing this file type. Most of those are because he is an asshole.
